text: Map of Massachusetts House of Representatives' 15th Essex district, 2013. Based on 2010 United States Census. Massachusetts House of Representatives' 15th Essex district in the United States is one of 160 legislative districts included in the lower house of the Massachusetts General Court. It covers part of Essex County. Democrat Linda Dean Campbell of Methuen has represented the district since 2007. ==Locales represented== The district includes the following localities: * part of Haverhill * part of Methuen The current district geographic boundary overlaps with that of the Massachusetts Senate's 1st Essex district. ===Former locales=== The district previously covered: * Marblehead, circa 1872 * part of Salem, circa 1872 ==Representatives== * George W. Butters, circa 1858-1859 * Charles Henry Symonds, circa 1888 * James D. Bentley, circa 1920 * Cornelius Joseph Murray, circa 1951 * Francis Joseph Bevilacqua, circa 1975 * Larry Giordano * Arthur Broadhurst * Linda Dean Campbell, 2007-current ==See also== * List of Massachusetts House of Representatives elections * Other Essex County districts of the Massachusetts House of Representatives: 1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th, 5th, 6th, 7th, 8th, 9th, 10th, 11th, 12th, 13th, 14th, 16th, 17th, 18th * Essex County districts of the Massachusett Senate: 1st, 2nd, 3rd; 1st Essex and Middlesex; 2nd Essex and Middlesex * List of Massachusetts General Courts * List of former districts of the Massachusetts House of Representatives ==Images== 1908 Charles Mansfield Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Charles Mansfield 1908 Herbert Forristall Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Herbert Forristall 1918 James Bentley Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|James Bentley 1935 Henry Cabot Lodge Jr Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Henry Cabot Lodge Jr. 1935 John Wilson Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|John Wilson 1945 Cornelius Murray Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Cornelius Murray 1945 Russell Brown Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Russell Brown 1953 C Henry Glovsky Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|C. Henry Glovsky 1967 Lawrence Smith Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Lawrence Smith 1975 Francis Bevilacqua Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Francis Bevilacqua 1983 Nicholas Buglione Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Nicholas Buglione 1995 Arthur Broadhurst Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Arthur Broadhurst ==References== ==External links== * Ballotpedia * (State House district information based on U.S. Census Bureau's American Community Survey).
